TopicTitle: Funny Short Film: Amazon Women from the Mun!

Articles.Content:
This was an entry to the [The Practical On-Kerbin Sci-Fi Film challenge.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122917-The-Practical-On-Kerbin-Sci-Fi-Film-challenge)

Basically make a sci-fi movie complete with a spaceship landing, but without actually building a spaceship nor leaving Kerbin. In other words, do it with Hollywood magic. With the recent addition of female Kerbals, I went with this particular theme.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/urzpg2yUexY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-22T15:52:43Z" title="06/22/2015 03:52  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 22, 2015</time> by Soda Popinski**
I laughed my rear end off when I heard the Star Trek alien transporter sound.

Brilliant and entertaining. Loved the "behind the scenes" part too.

P.S. Get your employess to sign a non-disclosure clause. Then it becomes "reported" accidents. See my sig.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-21T17:36:29Z" title="06/21/2015 05:36  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 21, 2015</time> by Voidryder**
  
Management Secret

> 
> I laughed my rear end off when I heard the Star Trek alien transporter sound.

Heh. Not sure if anyone noticed, but I put a soft focus filter on Valentina. Seemed era appropriate.

Thanks for checking out the film.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-21T18:04:27Z" title="06/21/2015 06:04  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 21, 2015</time> by Soda Popinski**
That's silly, I loved it! Brilliant, well done!

awesome clip....especially loved to see the behind the scenes to see how the saucer "flew"....I thought I saw wires there....

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) awesome job!!!!!

Does KSP even have a version of Hollywood?

Kollywood?

You should seriously make some more movies... even if you need to use tricks to do it, you know, more B-grade 1950's movies... add your own monsters...

> 
> Does KSP even have a version of Hollywood?
> Kollywood?
> 
> You should seriously make some more movies... even if you need to use tricks to do it, you know, more B-grade 1950's movies... add your own monsters...

If the right script comes along, I'll consider doing a sequel. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Brilliant work. Please do a sequel ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
